reviewText: This makes absolutely no sense! Because the DVD is for another region, it will not play in our DVD player. I bought the only one and can't even watch it! This is wrong! Wrong on all levels. I work hard for my money and it angers me that I can't return it, I trusted Amazon to warn me about these thing and they let me down. This was my first bad experience with online shopping I am so disappointed and will never order off-line again.
